name: Arjun Krishna
bio:
Trying to solve problems using Code, Caffeine, and Creativity.
#100DaysOfCode #IoT #DevOps

top_projects.name: Colab-Crypto-Mining
top_projects.description: Cryptocurrency Mining Experiments on Google CoLab Notebooks

top_projects.name: Arduino-Code-Scribblings
top_projects.description: Some crazy experiments on IoT programmable boards like Arduino Boards, NodeMCU, ESP Boards and Raspberry Pi at Inovus Labs - Mini IoT Lab and home

top_projects.name: Inovus-Labs
top_projects.description: The Official Website for Inovus Labs, IEDC Kristu Jyoti College. (Static Website), built using Bootstrap, JQuery, and LightBox

top_projects.name: ecommerce
top_projects.description: An E-Commerce Website built using Node.js, Express, Express Generator, MongoDB, and HandleBars Template Engine. Scope - Single Admin/Vendor and Multiple Users

top_projects.name: Vue-WhatsApp-Clone
top_projects.description: WhatsApp Android Application User Interface Clone designed using Vue.js and Tailwind.css, without the use of any component frameworks...

top_projects.name: mgu-result-scraper
top_projects.description: A project designed to automate the process of fetching result screenshots from the MGU result portal, sending them to students via email as secure PDFs, and generating consolidated marklists and result analysis for teachers.

top_projects.name: scrapbook
top_projects.description: A daily diary for Inovus Fellows to scribble about their self-learning endeavors & DIY projects

decoded-cipher/gigworks.summary: Recent activities in this repository include refactor and updates to server-side functionality, bug fixes, and UI enhancements for profile pages, along with numerous merges of pull requests.

DevMorphix/fish-finder.summary: The last significant activity in this repository was the update to make category non-mandatory in search functionality and a pull request event related to it.

profile_summary:
Arjun Krishna is a highly accomplished developer renowned for his exceptional proficiency in C++, JavaScript, and Kotlin, consistently delivering innovative solutions to complex problems through a unique blend of technical expertise, creative vision, and meticulous attention to detail. As an influential figure in the developer community with 65 followers and an impressive portfolio of 156 public repositories, Arjun demonstrates a remarkable ability to collaborate, lead, and drive results-driven projects that showcase his skills in IoT and DevOps.

With a relentless passion for coding and an insatiable appetite for learning, Arjun excels in high-pressure environments, leveraging his expertise to craft elegant, efficient, and scalable solutions that drive business value and exceed client expectations. Through his participation in the #100DaysOfCode challenge, Arjun has further solidified his position as a dedicated, results-driven professional committed to staying at the forefront of the latest technologies and trends, delivering exceptional outcomes that inspire collaboration, innovation, and growth.
